WorkItem.ClosedComment: ArPharazon fixed this by correcting the link
WorkItem.Description:
Since version 2.3, I'm getting this error message all the time, that says "Rawr encountered an error while attempting to load a saved image. If you encounter this error multiple times, please ensure that Rawr is unzipped in a location that you have full file read/write access".
I have full read/frite access to the folder that Rawr is on, but I still keep getting this message. Previous versions were installed in the same folder, and had no issues
WorkItem.Summary: Rawr encountered an error while attempting to load a saved image

Comments.Message:
I just had the same problem, and found that a pseudo-fix was to just delete the file it was unable to open. Mine was one of the pet images in the data/talent_images/hunter/pet directory, so I just deleted all of them and it got past the error.
And it didn't seem to have any major impact on functionality.

The source link for Talent Images is dead now and I don't know what the new one is (or I'd of fixed it by now). Astry has some other grand design where in which to get them, but the code went a little over my head when I tried to implement it.
